Properties.ProtectedString:
--Phoenix settings are here local Aggressive = true --Phoenix will attack enemies local SmallDamage = 15 local LargeDamage = 25 --Does more damage while tool is equipped local AttackRange = 40 local ShortReload = 2.5 --Shoots faster if given an assigned area to move to local LongReload = 4 local EquipReloadBonus = -1.25 --Shoots faster when tool is equipped local AssignmentDuration = 11 local MaxSpeed = 80 local Acceleration = 20 local SubAcceleration = 4 --Relative speed when approaching target --local PhoenixDuration = 5*60 --Copy of value from ToolScript
local SearchRangeXZ = 35 local SearchRangeY = 15 local ChaseRange = 60
function WaitForChild(parent, child) local result = parent:FindFirstChild(child) delay(3, function() if not result then print("Probably Stuck", child) end end) while not result do parent.ChildAdded:wait() result = parent:FindFirstChild(child) end return result end
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function getMassOfObject(obj) local children local mass = 0 if type(obj) == "userdata" then children = obj:GetChildren() elseif type(obj) == "table" then children = obj end if children then for i = 1, #children do if children[i]:IsA("BasePart") then mass = mass + children[i]:GetMass() end if #children[i]:GetChildren() > 1 then mass = mass + getMassOfObject(children[i]) end end end return mass end
local fireball = Instance.new("Part") fireball.FormFactor = 3 fireball.Shape = "Ball" fireball.Size = Vector3.new(1.0, 1.0, 1.0) fireball.CanCollide = false fireball.Transparency = 1
local fireballMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") fireballMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=57810032" fireballMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=101072441" fireballMesh.Parent = fireball fireballMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(2.0, 2.0, 2.0)
local Phoenix = script.Parent Phoenix.CanCollide = true
local leftWing = WaitForChild(Phoenix, "LeftWing") local rightWing = WaitForChild(Phoenix, "RightWing") local leftWeld = WaitForChild(Phoenix, "LeftWingWeld") local rightWeld = WaitForChild(Phoenix, "RightWingWeld") local Owner = WaitForChild(Phoenix, "OwnerRef") local TargetPoint = WaitForChild(Phoenix, "TargetPoint") local Sound = WaitForChild(Phoenix, "Sound") Sound:Play()
local MoveToPoint = Vector3.new(0,0,0) local EnemyTarget = nil
local LastAssignment = tick() - 1000
function IsToolEquipped() local char = Owner.Value if char and char.Parent then local refObject = char:FindFirstChild("PhoenixRefObject") local tool = char:FindFirstChild("IceBird") if refObject and refObject.Value == Phoenix.Parent and tool then return true end end return false end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil and player ~= nil then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function blow(fireball, hit)
local damage = SmallDamage if IsToolEquipped() then damage = LargeDamage end
if hit and hit.Parent and fireball then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Owner.Value local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and Owner.Value ~= hit.Parent then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end end
function setTransparency(value) if value == nil then value = 0 end Dragon.Transparency = value local children = Dragon:GetChildren() for i = 1, #children do if children[i] and children[i]:IsA("BasePart") then children[i].Transparency = value end end end
function findTargetNear(point)
end
local shooting = false
function shoot(object) if Phoenix == nil or Phoenix.Parent == nil then return false end shooting = true local bodyGyro = Phoenix:FindFirstChild("BodyGyro") local startPosition = Phoenix.Position + Vector3.new(0,2,0) direction = (object.Position - Phoenix.Position).unit if bodyGyro then bodyGyro.cframe = CFrame.new(startPosition, startPosition + direction) end wait(.5) if Phoenix == nil or Phoenix.Parent == nil or not object then return false end local startPosition = Phoenix.Position + Vector3.new(0,2,0) direction = (object.Position - startPosition).unit shootSound = Phoenix:FindFirstChild("Sound") if shootSound then shootSound.Pitch = .9 shootSound.Volume = .5 shootSound:Play() end local spawnPos = startPosition + direction * 4 local fireballC = fireball:Clone() fireballC.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction) fireballC.Name = "Fireball" fireballC.Velocity = direction * 60.0 local float = Instance.new("BodyForce") float.force = Vector3.new(0, fireballC:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) float.Parent = fireballC local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = fireballC fire.Color = Color3.new(.03,.47,.06) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(.21,1,.33) debris:AddItem(fireballC, 5.0) fireballC.Parent = game.Workspace fireballC.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(fireballC, hit) end) wait(.3) shooting = false local reloadTime if tick() - LastAssignment < AssignmentDuration then reloadTime = ShortReload else reloadTime = LongReload end if IsToolEquipped() then reloadTime = reloadTime + EquipReloadBonus end wait(reloadTime - .8) return true end
function FlapWings() local sign = 1 local count = 0
local initLC1 local initRC1
leftWeld = Phoenix:FindFirstChild("LeftWingWeld") rightWeld = Phoenix:FindFirstChild("RightWingWeld") if leftWeld and rightWeld then initLC1 = leftWeld.C1 initRC1 = rightWeld.C1 while Phoenix.Parent and leftWeld and rightWeld do leftWeld.C1 = leftWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, -sign * math.pi/30, 0 ) rightWeld.C1 = rightWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, sign * math.pi/30, 0) count = count + 1 if count > 7 then sign = sign * -1 count = count%6 end wait(1/15) end end end
local MoveDelay = .3 local CircleCounter = 0 function MoveToTarget() local bodyVelocity = Instance.new('BodyVelocity') bodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0) bodyVelocity.Parent = Phoenix bodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(10000,20000,10000) --Its strong enough to support your weight local bodyGyro = Instance.new('BodyGyro') bodyGyro.Name = "BodyGyro" bodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(1500,1500,1500) bodyGyro.Parent = Phoenix while Phoenix and Phoenix.Parent do if Owner.Value == nil or Owner.Value.Parent == nil or Owner.Value:FindFirstChild("PhoenixRefObject") == nil then debris:AddItem(Phoenix.Parent, 3.5) --Kill the phoenix if the owner dies Delay(1.5, function() Aggressive = false Phoenix.Fire.Size = 10 Phoenix.Fire.Heat = 25 end) end if not shooting then if tick() - LastAssignment > AssignmentDuration and Owner.Value then local torso = Owner.Value:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso then MoveToPoint = torso.Position + Vector3.new(0, -2, 0) end end CircleCounter = CircleCounter+1
local adjustedMovePoint = MoveToPoint + CFrame.Angles(0,CircleCounter/7,0) * Vector3.new(10,6,0) local moveVector = adjustedMovePoint - Phoenix.Position local targetSpeed = math.min(MaxSpeed, SubAcceleration * math.sqrt(moveVector.magnitude)) local curMag = bodyVelocity.velocity.magnitude local newSpeed if targetSpeed > curMag then newSpeed = math.min(targetSpeed, curMag + Acceleration * MoveDelay) else newSpeed = math.max(targetSpeed, curMag - Acceleration * MoveDelay) end bodyVelocity.velocity = moveVector.unit * newSpeed --print("target, vel", MoveToPoint, bodyVelocity.velocity) bodyGyro.cframe = CFrame.new(Phoenix.Position, Phoenix.Position + moveVector.unit + Vector3.new(0,-3,0) ) end wait(MoveDelay) end end
delay(0, FlapWings) delay(0, MoveToTarget)
TargetPoint.Changed:connect(function(val) LastAssignment = tick() MoveToPoint = val end)
wait(1)
while Phoenix and Phoenix.Parent do if Aggressive and (not EnemyTarget or (tick() - LastAssignment < AssignmentDuration)) then local pxPos = Phoenix.Position + Vector3.new(0,-8,0) local searchVec = Vector3.new(SearchRangeXZ, SearchRangeY, SearchRangeXZ) local searchRegion = Region3.new(pxPos - searchVec, pxPos + searchVec) local partList = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(searchRegion, Owner.Value, 50) local closestPart local closestDistance = ChaseRange for i,part in pairs(partList) do local partDistance = (part.Position - pxPos).magnitude local hum = part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if partDistance < closestDistance and hum and hum:IsA("Humanoid") and hum.Health>0 then closestPart = part closestDistance = partDistance end end if closestPart then EnemyTarget = closestPart.Parent end end if Aggressive and EnemyTarget then local hum = EnemyTarget:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local torso = EnemyTarget:FindFirstChild("Torso") while EnemyTarget and hum and torso and (Phoenix and Phoenix.Parent) do local attackVec = torso.Position - Phoenix.Position if hum.Parent and hum.Health > 0 and attackVec.magnitude < ChaseRange then local success = shoot(torso) if not success then break end else EnemyTarget = nil end wait(.0001) end end
wait(2) end

Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local PhoenixDuration = 5*60
function WaitForChild(parent, child) local result = parent:FindFirstChild(child) delay(3, function() if not result then print("Probably Stuck", child) end end) while not result do parent.ChildAdded:wait() result = parent:FindFirstChild(child) end return result end
function WaitForChildren(parent, childTable) for i = 1, #childTable do WaitForChild(parent, childTable[i]) end end
local Tool = script.Parent local Phoenix = Tool.Handle
local prevHealth = 100
local healthConnect
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local attacking
Tool.Enabled = true
local connection
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local leftWing = WaitForChild(Phoenix, "LeftWing") local rightWing = WaitForChild(Phoenix, "RightWing") local leftWeld = WaitForChild(Phoenix, "LeftWingWeld") local rightWeld = WaitForChild(Phoenix, "RightWingWeld") local HandleFire = WaitForChild(Phoenix,"Fire") HandleFire.Enabled = true
local PhoenixClone
function getMassOfObject(obj) local children local mass = 0 if type(obj) == "userdata" then children = obj:GetChildren() elseif type(obj) == "table" then children = obj end if children then for i = 1, #children do if children[i]:IsA("BasePart") then mass = mass + children[i]:GetMass() end if #children[i]:GetChildren() > 1 then mass = mass + getMassOfObject(children[i]) end end end return mass end
function HideTool() local partTable = {Phoenix, rightWing, leftWing} for i, v in pairs(partTable) do v.Transparency = 1 local fire = v:FindFirstChild("Fire") if fire then fire.Enabled = false end end Phoenix.CanCollide = false end
function ShowTool() local partTable = {Phoenix, rightWing, leftWing} local partTable = {Phoenix, rightWing, leftWing} for i, v in pairs(partTable) do v.Transparency = 0 local fire = v:FindFirstChild("Fire") if fire then fire.Enabled = true end end Phoenix.CanCollide = true end
function TrySpawnPhoenix() local oldPhoenixRef = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("PhoenixRefObject") if oldPhoenixRef then if oldPhoenixRef.Value and oldPhoenixRef.Value.Parent then return false else oldPhoenixRef:Destroy() end else WaitForChildren(Phoenix, {"Fire", "Mesh", "PhoenixScript", "OwnerRef", "TargetPoint", "LeftWing", "RightWing"}) WaitForChildren(Phoenix.LeftWing, {"Fire", "Mesh"}) WaitForChildren(Phoenix.RightWing, {"Fire", "Mesh"}) ShowTool() if not (Phoenix and Phoenix:FindFirstChild("LeftWing") and Phoenix:FindFirstChild("RightWing")) then return false end PhoenixClone = Phoenix:Clone() PhoenixClone.Name = "Torso" local phoenixModel = Instance.new("Model") phoenixModel.Name = "IceBird" PhoenixClone.Parent = phoenixModel PhoenixClone.OwnerRef.Value = Tool.Parent local phoenixRefObject = WaitForChild(Tool,"PhoenixRefObject"):Clone() PhoenixClone.PhoenixScript.Disabled = false
debris:AddItem(phoenixRefObject, PhoenixDuration) phoenixRefObject.Value = phoenixModel phoenixRefObject.Parent = Tool.Parent
debris:AddItem(phoenixModel, PhoenixDuration + 6) phoenixModel.Parent = game.Workspace return true end end
function onActivated() local humanoid = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not (humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0) then return end if TrySpawnPhoenix() then HideTool() return end local oldPhoenixRef = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("PhoenixRefObject") if oldPhoenixRef then local phoenixModel = oldPhoenixRef.Value if phoenixModel and phoenixModel.Parent then local curPhoenix = phoenixModel:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not curPhoenix then return end local phoenixTarget = curPhoenix:FindFirstChild("TargetPoint") if phoenixTarget then phoenixTarget.Value = humanoid.TargetPoint return end end end end
local equipDebounce = false function onEquipped() if equipDebounce then return end equipDebounce = true -- Horrendous is the name, for these checks if leftWeld then leftWeld.Parent = Phoenix end if rightWeld then rightWeld.Parent = Phoenix end
TrySpawnPhoenix()
HideTool()
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") wait(.5) equipDebounce = false end
function onUnequipped() --ShowTool() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
